content.html: In 1956, Harper Lee's friends gave her a full year's salary for Christmas so that she could take a year off from work to write Lee used that time to write "To Kill A Mockingbird" and sold more than 40 million copies
content.value:
In 1956, Harper Lee's friends gave her a full year's salary for Christmas so that she could take a year off from work to write

Lee used that time to write "To Kill A Mockingbird" and sold more than 40 million copies
